com.k2.Html5Builder

Class HtmlGlobalElement<T extends com.k2.XMLBuilder.XMLElement>

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.k2.XMLBuilder.XMLNode
      • com.k2.XMLBuilder.XMLElement
        • com.k2.Html5Builder.HtmlGlobalElement<T>
  • Type Parameters:
    T - The type of the final implementing class for the element
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    HtmlBase, HtmlElement, HtmlHead, HtmlLink

    public abstract class HtmlGlobalElement<T extends com.k2.XMLBuilder.XMLElement>
extends com.k2.XMLBuilder.XMLElement
    This abstract class is and extension of XMLElement and is the basis for all Html elements except the 'html' element The class defines methods to set the standard html attributes but not the html event attributes
    Author:
    simon

    • Field Summary

      • Fields inherited from class com.k2.XMLBuilder.XMLNode

        public HtmlPage page()
